description:
The Fixe replaces the Petzl® Fixed Side Pulley, and offers a well-considered balance of weight and strength. Designed for hauling systems, it’s heavier, more durable and stronger than the very lightest pulleys, but not as burly as a rescue pulley. This model features thinner, stronger side plates, which eliminate the need for the weight-reducing holes that were on the old version, so the system has a cleaner design.

  • Aluminum side plates
  • Self-lubricating bushings
  • Fixed side plates allow quick installation and coupling with a rope clamp
  • For ropes 7-13mm
  • Breaking strength is 23kN
name: Petzl Fixe Side Pulley
